name: Uninvited (itch)
description:
Made for Weekly Game Jam 203
 
Description: It is a first-person view survival, horror game with exploration elements.

Made by
Adam Z Hajdu: https://www.artstation.com/adamzhajdu
Viktoria Berta: https://www.artstation.com/viktoriaberta
Music: Mikey

Engine: Unreal Engine 5
Platform: PC
Mode: Single-player

Recommended System Requirement

  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-4720HQ CPU @ 2.60GHz
  • Memory: 8.00GB
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960M
  • Storage: 1.2 GB
